name: The Garden of silvergrass
description:
The game, which is scheduled to be released in 2023, is a text adventure that inherits the legitimacy of Visual Novel.
You have to be the main character of this game and dig up the truth behind the game with the right choice.

Synopsis

Na-ho, a senior in high school, feels free for a short time after finishing the CSAT.

But for a while, Na-ho, who was thinking about a photo to submit to the photography section of the Baekhyun Art Festival to become a photographer, meets a woman named Eun Se-mi in a silver grass field that he visited...

From the moment we first met, Na-ho was shaken and felt a strange sense of miss from Semi.
In the end, Naho recklessly follows Semi and asks Semi for a favor.


"Semi Nu-na, be my model."

"Are you trying to Seduce Me?"

Hah - ? what are you talking about??


Maybe it's can be stimulate your Nostalgia,

Maybe It's can be your New Pleasure,


At 2023, a korean romance fantasy that succeed to visual novel's ideology.

Now, story's begin again.
